resources.string: At first you need to open your internet.On clicking play online button, you will be redirected to the page where you can choose your opponent.Once you choose your opponent, a request will be sent to your opponent. After accepting your request both players will be redirected to the game page. In game page you will find a 5*5 empty cell matrix. You can fill this matrix either by choosing the default bingo matrix(which you will get by pressing a green icon at the bottom) or by yourself by clicking on the cell. Once you fill the matrix you need to start the game by pressing start button and wait for the opponent. When done you can start the game.What you have to do is select any number from the cell which you want to mark. Your opponent will also mark this number. Now your opponent will do the same thing and you have to mark that number which he/she chooses. This process will continue. You need to make "BINGO" as fast as possible. if every number in a row or column or diagonally is colored then one letter of bingo will be appeared at the bottom. Winner will be declared on the basis that who made his/her "BINGO" word first.While playing game you can also do chatting with your opponent.
To play online you need to login first!
